Lodge Bread Review | Bon Appetit









































Close Menu IconLoginRecipesCookingCultureShoppingRestaurantsBA MarketVideosPodcastSubscribe to our newsletterSign UpPrivacy and user agreementMain Navigation IconBA LogoBon appetitLoginlos angelesLodge BreadAll of the carbs in Culver CityFacebookPinterestTwitterEmailRen FullerGO: for Lodge Bread’s amazing loaves with the right amount crustiness, squishiness, and sourdough twang, plus pizza, toasts, and even classes!ORDER THE: classic country loaf, crumbly sprouted rye, and California-grown red wheat bread, along with the daily specials, like the next-level cinnamon-raisin. However, it’s much more than a bakery, with rows of two-tops and bar-like seating, so settle in with a toast (ricotta and jam! Avocado!) in the morning or perfectly charred and bubbled pizzas in the afternoon.THE VIBE IS: chill, with friends catching up over toasts and coffees or nearby office workers grabbing a loaf or two on their way home after work.PRACTICAL STUFF: Open every day, from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. You can register for bread-baking classes online (Bonus: They’ll tell you how to care for your sourdough starter!).—Elyse InamineRen FullerRen FullerRen FullerWE ALSO LOVESurfasThe one-stop shop for all your kitchenware and gourmet food dreamsCognoscentiSuper-seasonal coffee beans with a laser focus on flavorDestroyerLA essentials—from avocado toast to grain bowls—like you’ve never seen (or tasted) beforeExplore City GuidesAtlantaAustinBostonCharlestonChicagoCopenhagenLas VegasLondonLos AngelesMexico CityMiamiMontrealNew OrleansNew YorkParisPhiladelphiaPortlandSan FranciscoSeattleTokyoTorontoVancouverWashington, D.C.GET THE MAGAZINEBA LogoBon appetitSUBSCRIBESign up for Updates on the Bon AppétitCity GuidesSign UpWill be used in accordance with our user agreement and privacy policyBA LogoBon appetitSubscription FAQsMastheadNewsletter SignupAccessibility HelpRSS FeedsSite MapCondé Nast StoreCareersBon Appétit Media KitDo Not Sell My Personal InformationCondé NastFood Innovation Group: Bon Appétit and Epicurious© 2022 Condé Nast.
